feed.title: Paperless AI Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Paperless AI: v2.7.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add a configurable token limitation and response size by @habitoti in https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/pull/496
  • Exactly compute the new content size according to given token limit by @habitoti in https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/pull/498
  • Fix wrong model reference for Azure Playground by @habitoti in https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/pull/511
  • Bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/pull/514
  • fix issue #516 by @KoffeinKaio in https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/pull/521

New Contributors

  • @habitoti made their first contribution in https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/pull/496
  • @KoffeinKaio made their first contribution in https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/pull/521

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v2.7.6...v2.7.8

entry.title: New release for Paperless AI: v3.0.0 - Introduce the RAG Chat
entry.content:
üöÄ New Feature Announcement
Paperless-AI now includes a powerful, integrated RAG-powered Chat interface!
Introducing a whole new way to interact with your Paperless-NGX archive: instead of browsing, filtering, or guessing which tags to search for ‚Äî just ask.
Thanks to Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), you can now search semantically across the full content of your documents and get human-like answers instantly.

üîç No more guessing. Just ask.
Want to know ‚ÄúWhen did I receive my electricity contract?‚Äù, ‚ÄúHow much did I pay for the last car repair?‚Äù or ‚ÄúWhich documents mention my health insurance?‚Äù ‚Äî Paperless-AI will find it for you, even if you don‚Äôt remember the exact title, sender, or date.

üí° What does RAG bring to Paperless-NGX?
- True full-text understanding of your documents
- Context-aware responses ‚Äî beyond keyword search
- Useful when dealing with large or chaotic document archives
- Saves time, avoids frustration, and unlocks insights you may have forgotten you had stored
- Blazingly fast answers backed by your own trusted data

‚ö†Ô∏è Important Note: If you're installing Paperless-AI for the first time, please restart the container after completing the setup routine (where you enter your API keys and preferences). This ensures that all services initialize correctly and your RAG index is built properly.
‚ûï This step is not required when updating an existing installation.

entry.title: New release for Paperless AI: v3.0.1 - Fix date format as paperless-ngx updated their code
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [FIX] Send correct formatted created date on document update by @JonathanSaudhof in https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/pull/533

New Contributors

  • @JonathanSaudhof made their first contribution in https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/pull/533

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v3.0.0...v3.0.1

entry.title: New release for Paperless AI: v3.0.3
entry.content:
• Added / implemented a real working AI Status badge for the RAG Chat UI - to see if it is available and which model is loaded.

  • Removed the filter tab on RAG Chat as this feature is highly unstable and has to be fixed in the future.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v3.0.1...v3.0.3

entry.title: New release for Paperless AI: v3.0.4 - RAG Performance and stability update
entry.content:
Whats changed:

Hey dear community,

this new release will increase the performance of the RAG to startup by 95% (measured against 889 documents). The unnecessary step to re-index all documents after a restart of the container is now gone and it will start with all currently indexed documents. Also this made it possible to get real-time accurate information and health status of the RAG backend.

Don't miss this version!

  • Increase stability RAG process, use already indexed data instead of doing a re-index at every startup. Reducing the time by 95% to start. 43ff808

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v3.0.3...v3.0.4
